mapper.insert: INSERT INTO f95_data.f95_game (thread_id, title, game_version, views, likes, like_ratio, rating, game_update_date, gmt_create, gmt_modified, status, ext_info) VALUES (#{threadId}, #{title}, #{gameVersion}, #{views}, #{likes}, #{likeRatio}, #{rating}, #{gameUpdateDate}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'RELEASED', #{extInfo}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = values(title), game_version = values(game_version), likes = values(likes), like_ratio = values(like_ratio), rating = values(rating), game_update_date = values(game_update_date), gmt_modified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ext_info = values(ext_info);
